pageContext.claim: “She [Olivia Troye] was terminated. They didn't want her. She was terminated. She has nothing to do with me.”
pageContext.analysis: Troye resigned. After Lt. Gen. Keith Kellogg, Pence’s national security adviser, claimed he had fired her, Troye displayed on Twitter a screenshot of an August post on her Instagram account showing a coin Kellogg gifted her when she left the job. “This gift is not the action of someone who did what Kellogg claims he did,” Troye wrote.
